TextBlock.Text: MagMag: aka what's currently death staring me straight in the face is a rouge ringed lava planet that's hot enough to act as a star to its moons.

this heat is kept alive by the tidal forces from MagMag's moons that pull and churn the surface, keeping it hot with friction. though almost hypocritically, the moons don't seem to effect eachother one bit! weird..
by the looks of it this process could outlast any star! though i'm not sure if that'd come in handy. that'd require that all of the stars be at the end of their lives!
like imagine how unlucky you'd have to be to exist at just the right point in time to see the universe die right before your very eyes! that'd suck! :clueless:
